europeana:record.dc:title: Cuniculobracon verdui gen nov. & spec. nov. and a new species of Polemochartus Schulz (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) from Spain, with a note on Eremita Kasparyan (Hymenoptera: Ichneumonidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen

europeana:record.dc:description: Cuniculobracon gen. nov. (type species: C. verdui spec. nov.) from Spain (Braconidae: Helconinae) and Polemochartus ibericus spec. nov. from Spain (Braconidae: Alysiinae) are described and illustrated. A key to the West Palaearctic species of Polemochartus Schulz is added. Eremita perepetshaenkoi Kasparyan, 1995 (Ichneumonidae: Neorhacodinae) is reported from Central Spain.
